Directions: In a large bowl, combine the first six ingredients. Transfer to a greased 1-1/2-qt. baking dish. Toss bread crumbs and butter; sprinkle over the top. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 30 minutes or until heated through.
Ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cheddar cheese soup, undiluted
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped broccoli, thawed
